turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a grande latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like to pick up your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up at the Starbucks near the corner of I 610 and South Main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have a location approximately 600 feet from 610 and South Main Street. The address is South Main Street and Buffalo Speedway. Is this the store you want to pick up your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have you picking up at the 9602 South Main Street location. What time would like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have you picking up your coffee at approximately 9:46 pm at the South Main location. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of drink would like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A caramel macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like your latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Vente

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have a 1 hot Vente Caramel Macchiato. What type of milk would you like? Whole, 2%, Non-Fat, Soy, Almond, or Coconut?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole Milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like Whipped Cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are there any special directions that you would like to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it upside down and stirred.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have 1 Hot Venti Caramel Macchiato with whole milk and whipped cream, upside down and stirred. Are there any additional instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want extra whip cream, and extra caramel

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I have 1 Hot Venti Caramel Macchiato with whole milk and extra whipped cream, extra drizzel, upside down and stirred. Are there any additional instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order an additional drink or food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have one hot Venti Caramel Macchiato with whole milk and whipped cream, upside down stirred ready for you to pick up at the S Main location at 9:46 pm. Your order will be available in store or drive through with this confirmation number> #485819.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you and have a nice day.
